name: Tower Of Balance
description:
You Wake up in a strange place want to know where you are

then a voice talk to you and tells you that you are in the tower of testing

and that you have to share your power with your enemy

a small game made for CCC Jam in 3 days (Joined late in the jam XD )

so it doesn't have alot of game play :)

the game has power ups

9 stages to play

and not much mechanics
